xwikidoc.title: Locales names
xwikidoc.content: # Most of the languages names are based on http://ftp.ics.uci.edu/pub/ietf/http/related/iso639.txt locale.ca=Catalan locale.cs=Czech locale.da=Danish locale.de=German locale.en=English locale.es=Spanish locale.fr=French locale.gl=Galician locale.hi=Hindi locale.hu=Hungarian locale.hr=Croatian locale.it=Italian locale.ko=Korean locale.lv=Latvian locale.nl=Dutch locale.no=Norwegian locale.pl=Polish locale.pt=Portuguese locale.pt_BR=Brazilian Portuguese locale.ro=Romanian locale.ru=Russian locale.sk=Slovak locale.sv=Swedish locale.uk=Ukrainian locale.vi=Vietnamese locale.zh=Simplified Chinese locale.zh_TW=Traditional Chinese
